text.english: The LORD is their strength, And He is the saving refuge of His anointed. Save Your people, And bless Your inheritance; Shepherd them also, And bear them up forever.
text.arabic: الرَّبُّ عِزٌّ لَهُمْ وَحِصْنُ خَلاَصِ مَسِيحِهِ هُوَ. خَلِّصْ شَعْبَكَ وَبَارِكْ مِيرَاثَكَ وَارْعَهُم وَاحْمِلْهُم إِلَى الأَبَدِ.
